song_lyrics: Chhoḍo mero chīr Shyām, prāt bhayo pyāre... ṭek.
Chīḍīyā karat sor, hot he ghanṭā ghor,
Nathanīko motī ṭharyo, hār hu tumāre... chhoḍo 1
Mukhako tanbol gayo, dīpak so khīnna bhayo,
Mānanī mathat maī, piyā matavāre... chhoḍo 2
Tumato nīsanka sadā, nandake dulāre... chhoḍo 3
Tumaho jīvan prān, nīmakh na chhoḍu dhyān,
Muktānand gopīkā yu, vachan uchāre... chhoḍo 4
title: Chhoḍo mero chīr Shyām prāt bhayo pyāre

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1124: Sadguru Muktanand Swami

Category: Prabhatiya
